translation.en: But you kill people for fun. There's nothing good left on TV?
translation.es: Tú matas por diversión. ¿Ya no hay nada que ver en la tele?

translation.en: You killed all your friends...
translation.es: Tú mataste a todos tus amigos...

translation.en: because you didn't want to pay for a goddamn cab.
I wouldn't get too comfortable on that high horse, Ben.
translation.es: No dejes que se te suban mucho los humos.

translation.en: From the beginning of civilization... we've known there was something captivating...
translation.es: Desde comienzos de la civilización, siempre ha sido cautivante...

translation.en: about watching human beings fight for their lives.
translation.es: ...ver a seres humanos pelear por sus vidas.

translation.en: That's why we watch gladiator games, public executions...
translation.es: Por eso vemos juegos de gladiadores, ejecuciones...

translation.en: rubber- necking on the freeway.
But now the world's gone soft. Everything is safe. Everything is careful.
translation.es: Pero el mundo se ha ablandado. Todo es seguro, todo es cuidadoso.

translation.en: So, we created a sport for people who still have a thirst for savagery...
translation.es: Creamos un deporte para las personas que aún disfrutan del salvajismo...

translation.en: and we provided them with a box seat for life's ultimate drama.
translation.es: ...y les proveímos un palco para ver el máximo drama.

translation.en: Our customers are some of the most powerful people in the world.
translation.es: Nuestros clientes son las personas más poderosas del mundo, pero...

translation.en: But every year, they demand more.
More complicated rooms.
More interesting subjects.
More ways to gamble on life and death.
translation.es: Más maneras de apostar a la vida y a la muerte.

translation.en: Last year, they had college athletes...
translation.es: El año pasado eran atletas universitarios...

translation.en: the year before, savants...
and this year we had lone survivors.
They wanted to know if luck had anything to do with it.
translation.es: Querían saber si la suerte tuvo algo que ver.

translation.en: Lucky people don't get kidnapped and tortured by psychopaths.
translation.es: La gente con suerte no es secuestrada y torturada por psicópatas.

translation.en: You know, it's kind of hurtful when you call someone a psychopath, huh?
translation.es: Hiere un poco cuando llamas a alguien psicópata.

translation.en: I thought it was stupid, too.
translation.es: A mí también me parecía estúpido.

translation.en: But here you are...
our lowest- odds ever to win...
translation.es: ...el ganador menos probable de la historia...

translation.en: still alive.
I really didn't think it was possible...
but as I said...
you were the long shot.
So I won.
That means I get to go home, right?
Ben...
at the end of the Kentucky Derby...
do you think the horse gets a prize?
Hey. Hey, Ben.
Come on. Hey, Ben, come on. Come on.
Ben, come on, get up. Ben, come on, get up.
No!
You can't leave until we finish our game, Zoey.
translation.es: No te puedes ir hasta acabar nuestro juego.

translation.en: Okay, we have to make sure that--
He's dead.
Okay. Come on. Come on.
Come on, there's a service elevator.
You came back for me.
Yeah, well, I'm tired of being the only survivor.
translation.es: Estoy harta de ser la única sobreviviente.

translation.en: Zoey, go, go. ZOEY: Okay.
It's been 24 hours. He's stable now. You should get some rest.
translation.es: Ya pasaron 24 horas. Está estable. Usted debe descansar.

translation.en: Miss Davis?
Are you feeling well enough to come with me?
Miss Davis.
Wait, this was the waiting room. Okay?
And then it turned into a giant oven, okay?
translation.es: Y se convirtió en un horno inmenso.

translation.en: And there was fire. The fire came down from the ceiling.
translation.es: Y había fuego. ¡El fuego bajó desde el techo!

translation.en: We haven't found any evidence of the things you've described.
translation.es: No hemos encontrado evidencia de las cosas que describió.

translation.en: That. Look. This was the duct.
There was a painting that came down.
Have you ever seen things that weren't there before?
I am not imagining this, okay?
Look, Ben was there, too.
He'll tell you all this when he wakes up.
translation.es: Les dirá lo mismo cuando despierte.

translation.en: Right. Your friend, Ben Miller?
We got a report from the hospital.
They found traces of three different illegal substances in his bloodstream.
translation.es: Encontraron rastros de tres sustancias ilegales en su sangre.

translation.en: No way out.
Miss Davis. It's an anagram.
Dr. Wootan Yu.
translation.es: -Srta. Davis. -Es un anagrama. El Dr. Wootan Yu.

translation.en: MAN : Do you have the heart to let Dr. Wootan Yu help you--
translation.es: ¿Tiene el valor para dejar que el Dr. Wootan Yu le ayude...?

translation.en: No way out. Wootan Yu.
translation.es: Con las letras de Wootan Yu.

translation.en: Wootan Yu is No way out. DETECTIVE: Miss Davis.
translation.es: No way out significa no hay salida.

translation.en: No way out, Wootan Yu.
This. Look. That was a part of the game.
translation.es: Esto. Mire. Eso era parte del juego.

translation.en: This is part of the game!
We've got to vacate the premises.
Wootan Yu. Wootan Yu.
Thank you.
So, are you going to tell me what's going on?
I am the new regional sales rep for all of Logan Square.
translation.es: Soy el nuevo representante de ventas de todo Logan Square.

translation.en: I'm officially client facing. It's for vegan dog food...
translation.es: Hablo con clientes. Vendo comida vegana para perros...

translation.en: but, you know, you've got to start somewhere.
translation.es: ...pero por algún lado hay que empezar.

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
Is that homework?
What is this?
Mike Nolan died of a heart attack in a bathroom in Union Station.
translation.es: Mike Nolan murió de un infarto en un baño de la estación de trenes.

translation.en: Jason Walker was thrown from his bike on the I- 64...
translation.es: Jason Walker se cayó de su moto en la carretera I-64.

translation.en: DMT found in his system.
Danny Khan drowns in Lake Michigan.
translation.es: Danny Khan se ahoga en el lago Michigan.

translation.en: Amanda Harper, rock- climbing alone, because that makes sense...
translation.es: Amanda Harper, escalando sola, porque eso es lógico...

translation.en: falls and dies.
There would have been articles for us, too.
You've got to let this shit go.
I can't just pretend that they never existed.
translation.es: No puedo fingir que nunca existieron.

translation.en: Everyone else who was sent those invitations died...
and whoever sent them is still out there.
translation.es: ...y el que los invitó sigue suelto.

translation.en: Don't you want answers? We can find them.
They rigged the game so that we would lose and we won.
translation.es: Manipularon el juego para que perdiéramos y ganamos.

translation.en: We beat them at their own game.
translation.es: Los vencimos en su propio juego.

translation.en: I didn't have a lot to go on, but...
the logo...
it's an impossible object.
It's an Escher staircase that turns in on itself.
translation.es: Es una escalera de Escher que se voltea.

translation.en: It's totally unique.
The numbers are in a pattern on the staircase.
translation.es: Los números están en un patrón de la escalera.

translation.en: 23, 22 in a repeated sequence of right angles.
translation.es: 23, 22 en una secuencia repetida de ángulos rectos.

translation.en: They're coordinates...
for an unlisted industrial building in the middle of Manhattan.
translation.es: ...de un edificio industrial en medio de Manhattan...

translation.en: They're hiding in plain sight. What are we supposed to do with that?
translation.es: -Se esconden a plena vista. -¿Qué quieres que hagamos?

translation.en: I bought us plane tickets. Plane tickets?
Two weeks, I'm going. Zoey, it's called survivor's guilt.
translation.es: -En dos semanas, voy a ir. -Es culpa del sobreviviente.

translation.en: My therapist says that in order to live, you need to move on.
translation.es: Mi terapeuta dice que para vivir hay que dejar el pasado.

translation.en: Moving on doesn't mean running.
translation.es: Dejar el pasado no significa huir.

translation.en: And I'm done running. Are you in?
translation.es: Y ya me cansé de huir. ¿Cuento contigo?

translation.en: All right.
Yeah, I'm in. Let's do it.
You're not Jason Bourne, though.
Okay? Mm- hmm.
Come on. It's got to be in here.
Found it! X marks the spot.
translation.es: ¡Lo encontré! La X marca el lugar.

translation.en: Come on, come on, where is it?
This has to be it, right? I've got the tool!
translation.es: Tiene que ser esto. ¡Tengo la herramienta!

translation.en: Right here. It must connect to the bolt we found.
Okay. Try it on the door. See if it'll turn.
translation.es: ¡Pruébalo en la puerta! ¡A ver si gira!

translation.en: You can do it.
Anything? It's not going!
See if you can turn it. It's not working!
Try clockwise. Clockwise?
Yeah, clockwise! Okay.
Something happened here. What?
Terrain, terrain. What's this?
No, it's another riddle. I fly without wings, I cry without eyes.
translation.es: ¡Es otro acertijo! Vuelo sin alas. Lloro sin ojos.

translation.en: What does that mean? I don't know. Give me a second!
Heads down!
Brace for impact!
Wait, cloud! Try cloud! Cloud?
Yeah, cloud. Okay.
Try the door! Come on, let's go!
Pull up. Caution, terrain. Decision height. Terrain, terrain. Pull up.
translation.es: Elévese. Precaución, terreno. Altura crítica. Terreno, terreno.

translation.en: No, no! Come on! Come on!
translation.es: Elévese. Precaución, terreno. Altura crítica. Terreno, terreno. ¡Rápido! ¡Rápido!

translation.en: Caution, terrain. Terrain, terrain.
Do something! COMPUTER: Pull up. Decision height. Pull up.
Ending sim. Do you want to reset?
PUZZLE MAKER : No. Good work. We're ready for game time.
translation.es: No. Buen trabajo. Estamos listos para el juego.

translation.en: I hurt my goddamn hand on that bolt again, Larry.
translation.es: Me volví a lastimar con la tuerca, Larry.

translation.en: WOMAN : Deboard the simulator.
What's the probability of survival? It's approximately four percent.
PUZZLE MAKER: Well, it's not a game if she doesn't stand any chance.
translation.es: No es un juego si no puede sobrevivir.

translation.en: We've intercepted her flight information. It's on.
translation.es: Interceptamos su información de vuelo. Todo está listo.

translation.en: I'm so glad Zoey got over her fear of flying.
translation.es: Me alegra que Zoey superara su miedo de volar.

translation.en: Let's play again.
